name: Chocolate Dukkah Shortbreads
preparation: Turn oven up to 375° F (190° C).
On a Sheet Pan Liner, roll shortbread dough into a 10.5” square. Gently flip onto an appy maker. Using a rolling pin, firmly roll over to cut pastry.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Bake until light golden: 10–11 minutes for small, 12–14 minutes for large
In a double boiler or microwave, gently melt dark Belgian chocolate, stirring well.
Remove shortbread from oven. Drizzle generously with melted Belgian dark chocolate, then sprinkle with Dukkah.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
